Posts.Content: Hi Thanks for your reply its nice to talk to people who have made this decision and why, I will give it some more thought.
Posts.Title: Chemo yes/no

Posts.Content: Hi I have spoken to the oncologist who recommended it but said only 8 out of 100 were clear but they may have been clear anyway? 92 had a secondary, not good stats up until he said that I was all for it. I just don't know, I am going to a Demystifying Chemo session on Thursday after my pre Chemo appointment with the oncologist, maybe they will help. Thanks for listening.
Posts.Title: Chemo yes/no

Posts.Content: Hi You are so brave, what is a second FEC? Thanks
Posts.Title: Chemo yes/no

Posts.Content: Hi, I hope i am doing this right, all new to me. I have been going over the question, chemo yes/no, I have spoken to my family and made a list of for and against but keep coming back to the fact that I cannot see the benefits. I am going to have radio and HRT and my last results showed no cancer in the nodes. Anyone else said no to chemo? I would be grateful for your thoughts. Thanks.
Posts.Title: Chemo yes/no
